def_en: If a future event is foreseeable, you know that it will happen or that it can happen, because it is a natural or obvious consequence of something else that you know.
If you say that something will happen for the foreseeable future, you think that it will continue to happen for a long time.

def_cn: 在可预见的未来;不久;很快
def_en: If you say that something will happen in the foreseeable future you mean that you think it will happen fairly soon.
